# Introduction

This ebook is the research documentation published in a private GitHub repository for replication purposes and as supplementary material for the paper **A two-regime Markov-switching and news sentiment algorithm for leisure and entertainment tourism stocks and volatility index futures**, published in the journal [Management decision in the **** special number](https://www.emerald.com/insight/publication/issn/0025-1747).

The present book gives a detail of how id the authors collected and processed the input data and gives to the reader the steps and `R` code used to estimate the Markov-switching model and the logit model (OLS and ntueralnetwork) used to forecast the regime with the news sentiment indexes.
